content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron/Copper Smelting Setup
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 3 at position(4.0, 4.0)
- Furnace 4 at position(6.0, 4.0)
All furnaces are stone furnaces used for smelting iron ore and copper ore into plates

### Power Generation System
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at position(-2.5, 24.0)
- Steam engine at position(4.5, 24.5)
- Connected with pipe system for water transport from pump to boiler
- Connected with pipe system for steam transport from boiler to steam engine
- Small electric poles connecting power to lab and other consumers

### Research Setup
Lab at position(10.5, 0.5) connected to power grid, currently researching logistics technology

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items into entities
- Ensure required items are crafted or gathered before insertion attempts

### Errors when trying to craft items requiring assembling machines
- Items like copper cable and electronic circuits cannot be hand-crafted
- Need to set up assembling machines for automated production of these items

### Errors when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure the entity is crafted and available in inventory before attempting placement
- Check recipe requirements and craft all necessary components first

### Errors when trying to craft items with missing ingredients
- Verify all required ingredients are available in inventory before crafting
- For items requiring multiple sub-components, ensure all sub-components can be crafted or are available

### Errors with furnace inventory management
- Check furnace inventory capacity before attempting to insert more items
- Remove processed items from furnaces before adding new raw materials

### Errors with API attribute access
- When accessing prototype attributes, use proper attribute access syntax
- Avoid direct mathematical operations on model private attributes

### Research-related errors
- Ensure research prerequisites are met before setting new research
- Verify research facility is properly powered and supplied with required science packs
